#summary What's new in Release 3.7.
#labels Phase-Design

*Not final yet*

  * FormData#applyTo() changed a bit
  * Possibility to define name of velocity properties file to use via System-Property
  * Support for optional additional configuration via panama.properties file.
  * Possibility to define name of panama properties file to use via System-Property 
  * ConfigReader is deprecated, use Configuration class and panama.properties instead.
